Title: Relates to the purposes of the volunteer and exempt firefighters' benevolent association of Thornwood, New York
Summary: Expands the purposes of the volunteer and exempt firefighters' benevolent association of Thornwood, New York; provides for the payment to it of certain taxes imposed upon premiums on policies of fire insurance in foreign insurance companies.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 123 of the laws of 1945 incorporating the volunteer and exempt firemen's benevolent association of Thornwood, New York, in relation to the purposes of the volunteer and exempt firefighters' benevolent association of Thornwood, New York
